articles.title: Rasavathi Movie Review: A few compelling characters trapped in a non-compelling film - TOI Etimes
articles.description: Rasavathi fails to make a mark, even with many fascinating characters. The makers have indeed created many intriguing characters but then failed to place them in a setting that is as compelling as them.
